column2: [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA] [From.GetFirstName] supports me, and now gathers their army.\n They have sent some men for my command while they build their strength.
Let us take back our realms, and unite the snow and sea!
Lord Petyr 'Littlefinger' Baelish offers me his bastard daughter in exchange for an alliance...
I hear the wolves may be howling up north...
The Vale's assistance may be useful.
My bride to be has arrived, and though her hair is darker, I easily recognize it's Sansa! Obviously I cannot marry her.
Well, we are only 'half' siblings, and I do have a thing for red-heads!
